title: The Great Waldo Search
description: Follow Waldo into the realms of amazing fantasy! Find him among gobbling gluttons, battling monks, carpet flyers, great ball-game players, red dwarves, nasty nasties, fighting foresters, deep-sea divers, knights of the magic flag, unfriendly giants, underground hunters, and many, many more! Join Waldo in the incredible Land of Waldos!
author: Martin Handford
